code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Modal from"./Modal";import"./Task.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Task=_ref=>{let{id,title,description,dueDate,priority,status,fileUrl}=_ref;console.log(id);const[isModalOpen,setModalOpen]=useState(false);const toggleModal=()=>{setModalOpen(!isModalOpen);};const handleDelete=id=>{fetch("http://localhost:3001/task-delete/".concat(id),{method:"DELETE",credentials:"include"}).then(response=>{if(!response.ok){throw new Error("Network response was not ok");}window.location.reload();}).catch(error=>{console.error("Error:",error);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Due Date: ",dueDate]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Priority: ",priority]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Status: ",status]}),fileUrl&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleModal,className:"view-attachment-btn",children:"View Attachment"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDelete(id),className:"task-done-btn",children:"Task Done"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal,{isOpen:isModalOpen,onClose:toggleModal,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("iframe",{src:fileUrl,title:"Attachment",className:"attachment-iframe",allowFullScreen:true})})]});};export default Task;
